Name: Fallout: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game
About the game: You've just unearthed the classic post-apocalyptic role-playing game that revitalized the entire CRPG genre. The FalloutÂ® SPECIAL system allows drastically different types of characters, meaningful decisions and development that puts you in complete control. Explore the devastated ruins of a golden age civilization. Talk, sneak or fight your way past mutants, gangsters and robotic adversaries. Make the right decisions or you could end up as another fallen hero in the wastelands...
